name: Shifting Reality (KenneyJam 2019)
description:
GameJam Theme: Unlikely Combinations

GameJam entry exclusively using Kenney assets.

Use W,S,A,D Keys to move your character around. Space to Jump and 2x Space to Double Jump. 

If I had more time, I would be able to add more polishing to audio and UI design. 

Enjoy my game.
